text: I have been experiencing pain in my left shoulder and was unable to raise my arm, but thanks to Dr. Bernard Lee and Michelle, it's like a miracle - just 30 minutes after the procedure, I was able to raise my arm again. 10cc of fluids were removed from my shoulder. I've known Dr. Lee for almost 12 years and have seen firsthand how he works, ensuring that his patients won't require another procedure. He guarantees that it will be done correctly. Once again, thank you so much Dr. Bernard Lee and Michelle. More power to Singapore Pain Care, and I'm sure more patients will be pain-free once they see Dr. Lee. 5 ⭐️ service, very highly recommended.

I cannot express enough gratitude towards Dr Bernard and his team for their professionalism and delication to patient care. After numerous of orthopedic specialists with no solution to my persistent pain, Dr Bernard were able to diagnose me with fibromyalgia and giving me the right treatments to cure my pain.

The staff are very friendly and compassionate, if you are struggling with chronic pain, I highly recommend Dr Bernard Lee, he will be able to provide a painfree solution :)

I've had a great experience with this pain specialist clinic. The staff are very helpful and professional, not just during the procedure but also afterward—they're quick to respond to any questions or concerns I have. I truly appreciate their support and follow-up care. I would highly recommend this clinic to anyone dealing with ongoing pain or aches.

Totally no longer having pain at my lower back from my slipped disc which I had suffered for many years. Lifestyle were more or less back to how it was. Glad that I came to Dr Bernard Lee for treatment.

Visited SG Paincare on 20 Feb to see Dr Bernard Lee for a Coreflex injection for my knee pain. Was attended warmly by Michelle and Sherlynn who were both competent and reassuring especially during the injection process. Dr Lee was also professional in his diagnosis. It’s been almost 2 weeks now and I feel like my knee has been given a new lease of life - finally pain free after living with the pain for 2 years. Thanks Doc, Michelle & Sherlynn!
